com.google.appinventor.components.scripts

Class ComponentDescriptorGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.annotation.processing.AbstractProcessor
      • com.google.appinventor.components.scripts.ComponentProcessor
        • com.google.appinventor.components.scripts.ComponentDescriptorGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Processor

    public final class ComponentDescriptorGenerator
extends ComponentProcessor
    Tool to generate simple component descriptors as JSON. The output is a sequence of component descriptions enclosed in square brackets and separated by commas. Each component description has the following format: { "name": "COMPONENT-TYPE-NAME", "version": "VERSION", "categoryString": "PALETTE-CATEGORY", "helpString": “DESCRIPTION”, "showOnPalette": "true"|"false", "nonVisible": "true"|"false", "iconName": "ICON-FILE-NAME", "properties": [ { "name": "PROPERTY-NAME", "editorType": "EDITOR-TYPE", "defaultValue": "DEFAULT-VALUE"},* ], "blockProperties": [ { "name": "PROPERTY-NAME", "description": "DESCRIPTION", "type": "YAIL-TYPE", "rw": "read-only"|"read-write"|"write-only"|"invisible"},* ], "events": [ { "name": "EVENT-NAME", "description": "DESCRIPTION", "params": [ { "name": "PARAM-NAME", "type": "YAIL-TYPE"},* ]},+ ], “methods”: [ { "name": "METHOD-NAME", "description": "DESCRIPTION", "params": [ { "name": "PARAM-NAME", "type": "YAIL-TYPE"},* ]},+ ] }
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney), sharon@google.com (Sharon Perl) - added events, methods, non-designer properties (for use by browser-based blocks editor)

    • Method Detail

      • outputResults

        protected void outputResults()
                      throws IOException
        Description copied from class: ComponentProcessor

        Outputs the required component information in the desired format. It is called by ComponentProcessor.process(java.util.Set<? extends javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement>, javax.annotation.processing.RoundEnvironment) after the fields ComponentProcessor.components and ComponentProcessor.messager have been populated.

        Implementations of this methods should call ComponentProcessor.getOutputWriter(String) to obtain a Writer for their output. Diagnostic messages should be written using ComponentProcessor.messager.

        Specified by:
        outputResults in class ComponentProcessor
        Throws:
        IOException
